[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5339673][b][color=white]Poke Ball Award[/color][/b][/url]
The hype with Pokemon Go has not ended yet. This past week, [b][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#ff66ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] added a new award, Poke Ball, for all those pokemon trainers to earn simply by luck. To earn this award, you have to post in the [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=358]Pokemon Go subforum[/url] and the current chance of earning one is 250:1. It works just like the clover awards. What are you waiting for? Go catch it!

[url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5343520][b][color=white]New Marketplace Violation[/color][/b][/url]
A new policy violation for the marketplace has been added in by [b][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#ff66ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b]. Users are no longer allowed to vouch for a product or seller in the same thread multiple times or else it will be counted as a low quality post and thread bumping which are already against policy. You can reports posts who violate this policy using the report button and select "Multiple Vouching". If caught multi-vouching, you can be warned, closed, or possibly banned or rep killed too.

[color=transparent]     [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/HFWiki.png[/img][/align]

Good day, users of Hack Forums! As [R]ight [H]and [M]an of the Hack Forums Wiki, I am obliged to inform you that the recruitment for positions inside the Wiki Team is open as of the 13th of this month. [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5337930]The thread[/url] can be found in the [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=52]Group and Crew General Discussions board[/url]. If you are looking to enhance your taste in wiki-based markups, or most importantly, to improvise and better your understanding of the English language, now is the perfect time to join the team. We hopefully wish to see more interest from applicants in the upcoming days.

Besides that, the Wiki Team as of now is working on numerous projects to enhance the connection between the community and the Wiki, so as to aiming at enriching the history of this forum. These projects will soon be released and shared towards the community, one by one after rigorous testing and optimization. All I can say for now is, stay tuned! 

Any questions regarding anything and everything about the Wiki can be forwarded towards the team leader, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=23809]Viral Dragon[/url] or [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2504443]me[/url]. Please be open and descriptive if possible, so that we can get back to you with an accurate reply. Criticisms, feedback and suggestions are greatly appreciated. 

The Wiki Team wishes the News Team a belated congratulations for reaching its 300th edition. Their position as the primary pillar of Writers helped set its standards as far more unique than anyone has ever anticipated in this forum. We hope that the News Team carries on the fine job that it does until its last day, where friendships have been woven and knowledge has been given.

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/Interview.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Omni, it's a pleasure to have you for the 300th edition of the HF News. It's incredible to see how much has changed on HF over the course of these editions. To celebrate, we will be providing giveaways for the community and as well as giving the community a chance to interview you. Let's get started!

[hr]

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] To start off our interview, users [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1192576][color=#00AAFF][b]Egroeg[/b][/color][/url] and [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=white][b]Ariana[/b][/color][/url] have questions concerning Pokemon. Egroeg asked, "How many and what kind of Pokemon do you have? Also what team are you on?" Ariana asked, "If you could be any Pokemon, which one would you be and why?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] Just started so I only have one Pokemon but I plan on starting over to get Pikachu. Mainly playing through my kid who love the game. I don't really have a lot of spare time for actual game play.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Up next, user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=952566][color=white][b]Armada[/b][/color][/url] has asked, "What future plans do you have for the future of the community?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] Plans are pointless if you can't execute and unfortunately because of my persistent time restraints a lot of plans never get executed. The past year or so has been a lot better. But to actually answer the question...I hope to get us on MyBB 1.8x series somewhere in September. I know if I can't get to something by June then it has to wait till September. I'm way too busy ever summer to really work.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] User [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1134879][color=#00AAFF][b]Elegant[/b][/color][/url] has asked, "How do you see Hack Forums as a whole in 5 years time from now? 10 years time?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] Hopefully more mobile friendly and a tighter interface for users. I'm very unhappy with current GUI. I have some ideas to execute once we're on 1.8x.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] User [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2110841][color=white][b]Night Fury[/b][/color][/url] asked, "Do you feel that Hack Forums' members continue to mature as the site ages, or do you feel that older generations leave, and younger generations replace them?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] Actually it's very consistent our daily registrations. We're nine years old and so members who may have been 14 and had all day to be online are now 23 with jobs, college, or maybe even a family. Lucky for HF there are new members joining daily and many might be 14. I think it's a benefit to continue to be an attractive site to a younger generation.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] User [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=431105][color=white][b]Tɦɛ Gʀiɱ[/b][/color][/url] has a question that concerns with the Marketplace. He asks, "What do you think of the eBook section filled with none working eBooks and normal members getting scammed by that?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] I think anyone buying an ebook or even using the HF Marketplace in general is always taking a risk. We're not going to vouch for products or sellers. And I've never seen a compelling reason to remove Ebook sales. If you say they are scams because they don't work then we ban them based on that we're creating a system to eliminate Marketplace activity based on product/service validation. It would start with Ebooks but that same logic would be placed into other sections. HF Marktplace has mainly thrived due to the minimal interference we have.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] User [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3183372][color=#00AAFF][b]Previously Known As....[/b][/color][/url] has asked, "Has running HackForums been as rewarding as you'd like? Do you ever regret not selling the forum earlier and moving on to a new project (regardless if the buyer was undercover FBI or not), or has your experience here been fulfilling? Additionally, BV1 would like to know if he can have his old awards back."
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] I don't waste my time on considering changes to decisions I've made. That answers both questions.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] On the topic of food, user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2504443][color=white][b]reve4 neeuQ[/b][/color][/url] has asked, "Are you interested in trying an Indian-style Chicken Biryani? If so, please make a YouTube video about it. Big fanatic of exotic food here, what kind of food do you love to eat most of the times?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] I eat Indian food often. I believe I've tasted most of their ethnic recipes. Chicken Biryani was pretty good. 

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] With a lot of questions in mind, user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=716331][color=white][b]Cryptic™[/b][/color][/url] has asked, "What is something that you always wanted to do (whether it be a business venture, or anything else), that you haven't been able to do due to all the time HF requires? What does you think is missing from HF? What is your net worth?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] Yes, there is a lot I'd like to accomplish but HF has prevented me from doing much because of the consistent time it requires to maintain this place. I'm busy and that itself can be rewarding enough. HF is missing a lot of things. My net worth isn't nearly as big as people think. Seems to be this misconception I'm a millionaire. Meanwhile I drive a 2003 minivan, use coupons at the grocery store, and prefer to buy everything when it's on sale. Certainly I'm not broke but I have 4 kids and they are at an age that seems to very costly. I'd say most of my income goes just towards the home and the kids. My biggest luxury is my fine cigars and Scotch.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=white][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Lastly, user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=182754][color=#00AAFF][b]Orgy[/b][/color][/url] has been dying to "pop the question".. "When do you plan to give me my 10th asswipe award?"
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient:[/b][/color][/url] Since it's 2016 and based on Orgy's trolling and current Asswipe ratio, I think he's looking at 2021 or so for number 10. 

[/align][/spoiler][/align]

[url=http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-07/qmuo-smo071416.php][b][color=white]Cloak of Invisibility[/color][/b][/url]
Researchers from the Queen Marry University of London have come excitingly close to replicating the famous invisibility cloak from Harry Potter. In order to do this, researchers have taken full advantage of nanotechnology and its ability to transfigure material. In cooperation with the QMUL's School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science, the university has been able to 'trick' electromagnetic waves into perceiving curved surfaces as a flat surface! This technology is still far off from being the invisibility cloak we have seen in the movies but that doesn't mean it's useless; the use of nanotechnology appears to allow antennas to be placed almost anywhere and with numerous materials, as opposed to its singular/upright and obsolete counterpart being used all over the world today.  

[url=http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-07/uoh-rst070816.php][b][color=white]Muscle Stimulation Treatment Shows Promise[/color][/b][/url]
Rehabilitation research conducted at the BioMag Laboratory at the Helsinki University Hospital has shown promise for those with spinal cord-related injuries. Using two patients--both suffering spinal cord-related injuries--the team has been able to show tremendous improvement in the use of (previously paralyzed) sections of muscle. One of the patients being tested suffers through day to day life as a paraplegic (numb from the waist down with no control) and had absolutely zero feeling below the waist before treatment started; after just six months of treatment, the paraplegic patient had use of both of their ankles once more. Keep in mind, this patient had not moved their ankles in over two years since the traumatic accident that originally caused the paralysis. Dr. Shulga, one of the doctors administering treatment, said, "We observed strengthened neural connections and partial restoration of movement to muscles which the patients were previously entirely unable to use."

[url=http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-07/du-spt071516.php][b][color=white]OCD Beware[/color][/b][/url]
A study produced by Duke University points to a better and more precise understanding of OCD and related neurological disorders. The study takes a more precise look at a chemical receptor that is known to induce OCD-like symptoms in mice. With this new found understanding, researchers have been able to conclude that treating OCD and related neurological disorders with prescription drugs might be easier and more reliable than before. Dr. Nicole Calakos, M.D., Ph.D., and lead scientist in the study states, "These new findings are enormously hopeful for considering how to approach neurodevelopmental diseases and behavioral and thought disorders."

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]

[url=https://www.good.is/articles/no-more-endangered-species-for-dinner][b][color=white]China Outlaws Consumption of Endangered Species[/color][/b][/url]
China has taken steps to improve its animal rights record. During the beginning of July, China passed a new law that bans the sale of food products originating from endangered species. However, endangered animals can still be used for captive breeding, public performances, and consumption in non-food products. This means that traditional Chinese medicine, a common user of endangered animal parts, will still be allowed to use those parts in its concoctions. This new law comes as relief to animal rights activists, but they acknowledge that much more work needs to be done.

[url=https://asiancorrespondent.com/2016/07/philippines-duterte-drug-addicts/][b][color=white]Death Toll Rises in the Philippines[/color][/b][/url]
President Rodrigo Duterte of the Philippines has urged the public to kill drug dealers and drug addicts. President Duterte says that drugs are destroying the youth of the country, and believes killing the people involved is the best way to resolve the issue. As incentive to perform the task, Duterte is offering medals to those that kill drug dealers. Over the weekend after his announcement, 18 suspected drug dealers were killed in separate incidents, and 952 confessed drug users and pushers surrendered themselves to authorities over fear of safety. Of the 18 killed over the weekend, only three were killed by policemen. As of the most recent report, 30 drug-related suspects have been killed since the initiative took place.

[url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/as-france-probes-latest-carnage-officials-warn-that-terror-threats-will-stalk-for-a-long-time/2016/07/15/1dce56da-4a74-11e6-acbc-4d4870a079da_story.html][b][color=white]Terror Attack Kills More Than 80 in France[/color][/b][/url]
Many celebrating Bastille Day, France’s national holiday, were killed or injured in a terrorist attack in Nice, France. The night of the celebration was cut short when a truck drove through a crowd of people for more than a mile. The most recent report puts the death toll at 84, and the number of injured at 202. The driver was killed by police in an ensuing gunfight. Based on the most recent information, the Tunisian-born attacker does not have any known ties to terrorist organizations.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/TechNews.png[/img][/align]

[align=left][url=https://techcrunch.com/2016/07/13/pokemon-go-tops-twitters-daily-users-sees-more-engagement-than-facebook/][b]Pokémon Go surpasses Twitter in amount of users[/b][/url]
Pokémon Go is taking the world by storm, everywhere you go people are on their phones looking for their next catch.  As of July 13 2016, Pokémon Go has surpassed Twitter in amount of users, and sees more daily use than Facebook.  It is officially the most popular mobile game of all time, and has even found its way onto our beloved forum, with the addition of an award, a subforum, and even the main logo of Hack Forums dedicated to Pokémon Go.  People worldwide are playing daily, and a whopping 5.92 percent of Android's entire population has downloaded the app. 10% of America's population has downloaded the app, and that statistic is growing as we speak.  It is rapidly closing in on Snapchat, and even Google Maps.  At the rate it is currently growing it is set to be the most popular app to ever hit the market.  I myself just started today and can see why it is growing so quickly!

[url=http://www.pcmag.com/news/346178/ford-invests-in-artificial-intelligence-for-self-driving-car][b]Ford next in line to produce fully autonomous vehicles[/b][/url]
With the popularity Tesla Motors is getting with their fully autonomous driving mode, companies have to vie to stay relevant, especially with the announcement of the Tesla Model 3, set to start at $35,000, a price point many consumers can afford.  With that, Ford has decided to join in.  Ford invested $6.6 million in a California-based start-up working on artificial intelligence-powered mapping called Civil Maps.  Civil Maps provided a video with some insight on the technology behind self-driving cars.  The investment shows how serious Ford is about autonomous vehicles.  What is yet to be determined is will the addition of an "autopilot" into Ford's vehicles drive the price way up?  If Ford can manage to include the autopilot while maintaining their affordable prices, the car market will change dramatically, and pretty soon all manufacturers will join in.  Ford hasn't released any official plans or statements on the projects with Civil Maps, so for now the public waits for what's in store from Ford.

[url=https://techcrunch.com/2016/07/15/facebook-twitter-and-youtube-blocked-in-turkey-during-reported-coup-attempt/#/][b]Attempted coup in Turkey results in Facebook and Twitter being blocked [/b][/url]
In response to the attempted coup by the Turkish military, the government blocked Twitter, Facebook, and even Youtube for an hour and a half.  The actions were taken in hopes of stopping any spread of rumors or false statements that may spread fear or perhaps incitement of joining the coup. Many Turkish citizens used VPNs to access the sites, as tweets were coming out during the blockage from Turkish accounts.  The U.S. State Department tweeted out that the social media platforms were being blocked, and said that if you needed to reach any loved ones in Turkey, use SMS, email, or a phone call to get through. The reason for the coup is still unknown.
[/align]

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/yelp-joins-the-pokemon-go-craze-adds-filter-for-bu/1100-6441861/][color=white]Yelp Joins the Pokemon Go Craze![/color][/url][/b]
Yelp is the latest company to think of ways to profit off of Pokemon Go's success, offering a new filter that will be of use to Pokemon Go players. Yelp announced that when using its website or app to search for a business, you can choose to filter by those located near a PokeStop. For now, this feature is only available in the US, Australia, and New Zealand. However, Niantic aims to make this available in over 200 countries. For Yelp's filter to be effective, it's requesting users' help in identifying businesses that are near PokeStops. When checking into a location, it'll prompt you with a question. It'll ask if a PokeStop is within range from the establishment you are currently at. The offical statement from their blog reads as follows. "In order to leave no PokeStop unturned, we need your help!" it said. "To identify a business that's in the vicinity of a PokeStop, check-in to that location on Yelp and answer a quick question to let fellow Yelpers and trainers know that this is the place they want to be. In just the past 24 hours, Yelpers have already identified thousands of PokeStops! With your help, we'll become Pokemon masters in no time". Pokemon Go has been making ~5 million dollars a day since its release and it doesn't seem to be slowing down. It is only a matter of time before more companies devise ways to cash in on the success of the game.

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/gamestop-has-now-raised-more-than-5-million-for-ch/1100-6441724/][color=white]GameStop Raised More Than $5 Million for Childhood Cancer Research[/color][/url][/b]
Video game retailer GameStop has announced that its recent charity drive to support St. Jude Children's Research Hospital raised $760,000. The month-long event ran from May 27 to June 30; people could donate at GameStop and ThinkGeek's physical and online stores. Additionally, GameStop subsidiaries Kongregate and Game Informer ran campaigns to support the charity effort to the best of their abilities. This was their fourth event to raise money for St. Jude, which helps advance the research and treatment of childhood cancer. Matt Hodge, VP of investor relations at GameStop stated that "on behalf of everyone at St. Jude, we would like to thank our customers for donating and supporting this year's campaign. Every penny we raised will go toward helping kids fight cancer." GameStop has donated to various other charities and will continue to do so as they firmly believe that it is everyone's obligation to do their part. 

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-tekken-7-characters-confirmed-see-them-in-acti/1100-6441873/][color=white]New Tekken 7 Characters Announced![/color][/url][/b]
Two new fighters were recently revealed at EVO16 by Tekken 7's creator, Katsuhiro Harada. One of the fighters revealed was a familiar face! Bob will be returning for Tekken 7 and he ditched his more formal attire for an unbuttoned Hawaiian shirt. Bob doesn't appear to have changed much when viewing the announcement trailer, but it is still far too early to tell. In previous titles, Bob was a character with various set-ups that were easy to abuse for a win. However, that might change as many characters have received loads of nerfs and buffs. Bob's reveal trailer can be viewed [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEsxdovAfX4]here[/url]. Master Raven was the second character introduced at EVO16. In contrast, she is a totally new character despite taking a lot of inspiration from Tekken 5's Raven. Not much is known about her as of now, but Harada has confirmed on Twitter that she was actually Raven's superior. Her revealed trailer in which she showcases her ninjitsu can be viewed [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6gXxKawG7_4]here[/url]. Tekken 7 is set for an early 2017 release.

[url=https://www.theguardian.com/music/2016/jul/18/taylor-swift-condemns-kim-kardashians-release-of-kanye-west-phone-call][b][color=white]Taylor Swift and Kanye West's "Famous" Drama[/color][/b][/url]
With the release of West's new album, "The Life Of Pablo", one of his songs has lived up to his stereotype of being controversial, and that song was "Famous". In the beginning of the song, West raps "For all my Southside ****** that know me best / I feel like me and Taylor might still have sex / Why? I made that b*tch famous." When the song was initially released, there was a lot of attention on social media about these specific lines of lyrics, but West assured to his fans that, "I called Taylor and had a hour long convo with her about the line and she thought it was funny and gave her blessings." To provide more proof that this phone conversation actually happened, Kim Kardashian uploaded several clips of the phone conversation to her Snapchat. However, Swift is claiming that West never read anything in the lyrics about calling her "that b*tch", and the videos uploaded onto the Snapchat prove this to be true as well. If you are interested in reading Swift's response to the situation, you can check it out [url=https://www.instagram.com/p/BH_TCz4DeSj/]here[/url]. 

[url=http://www.nytimes.com/2016/07/19/world/europe/turkey-erdogan-crackdown.html][b][color=white]Turkey Widens Purge as Crackdown Continues[/color][/b][/url]
On July 15, a coup started to unfold on the streets of Turkey's capital, Ankara, and Istanbul. The Turkish military started to block the Bosphorus Bridge that connects the European and Asian sides of Istanbul. The attack itself only lasted a few hours before it ultimately failed. On July 18, Turkish officials have removed thousands of police officers that are believed to have had an affiliation with the failed military coup. According to The New York Times, around 9,000 police officers were fired, around 6,000 of those were to be arrested along with 103 generals and admirals, and around 3,000 judges were suspended over the weekend.

[url=http://www.hotnewhiphop.com/meek-mill-pledges-to-stop-rapping-about-extreme-violence-after-dc4-news.22886.html][b][color=white]Meek Mill Pledges to Stop Rapping About Extreme Violence After "DC4"[/color][/b][/url]
With recent events involving the police killings of Alton Sterling and Philando Castile, Meek Mill has announced that he will not be rapping about extreme violence after his next album, "Dreamchasers 4", on Instagram. On one of the two Instagram posts, Mill goes to explain that he does not regret rapping about the reality him and other countless people have endured in their lives, but instead, he is going to start aiming for a more uplifting message in his raps. Mill goes to explain in the post, "I have a right to express myself. Don't question my raps because it's a life we lived and suffered from." In his other Instagram post, he goes to explain that he wants his fans to speak up and hopes that other iconic artists speak up against institutional racism.
